title: K-12 Code Camp Educator (College Ambassador)
description: We are seeking enthusiastic college students to join our K-12 Code Camp as Educators for our upcoming summer sessions. In this role, you will be the front line of tech education, leading immersive coding workshops for students in grades 3-12. You will teach core programming concepts using Python, JavaScript, and Scratch while fostering a fun and inclusive learning environment. As a college-level mentor, you will inspire students through your own academic journey and technical projects, helping them see the real-world impact of computer science. Key responsibilities include curriculum delivery, individual student mentorship, and collaborating with a team of fellow university students to create the ultimate camp experience. Ideal candidates are current CS or STEM majors with excellent communication skills and a passion for community building.
